attributes.action: Motability must reduce its prices as a result of its excessive profits.
attributes.background: Motability is the only organisation providing cars for people with the higher component of Personal Independence Payment (PIP). Motability is 100% funded by the Government, so YOU are paying it to make a lot of profit and pay its executives a large salary. Give the disabled a better deal.

rejection.details:
Motability is an independent charity, not part of the UK Government or Parliament. 

You can find out more here:

http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/SN00473
